summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a potential off-the-record meeting with a sultan. The email emphasizes confidentiality and includes disclaimers regarding the privileged nature of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, suggesting a meeting with a sultan.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, being asked if he should meet with the sultan.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating about a potential meeting, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email discusses a potential off-the-record meeting with a sultan.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
There are multiple disclaimers regarding the unauthorized use of the email.
